title: Five-Star Beachfront Escape in Mauritius
description: Leave it all behind and venture to the exotic island of Mauritius - a dreamy drop in the Indian Ocean. Spend six unforgettable nights at the impressive Sugar Beach Resort, a colonial beachfront estate on Flic-en-Flac beach, and get the full celebrity treatment: daily breakfast, nightly dinners accompanied by a beer or a glass of wine per person, a welcome cocktail served in the colonial-style lobby, 20% discount on spa treatments, return private airport transfers and a world of complimentary activities and water sports available. Bring the kids along, two kids aged 11 and under stay for free - with nightly dinners included.
location_description: Sugar Beach A Sun Resort Mauritius 2018
offer_address: Coastal Road, Wolmar, Flic en Flac, 230 Flic-en-Flac, Mauritius

title: Beachfront Adults-Only Escape with Daily Dining
description: Indulge in complete relaxation and next-level pampering at Seasense Boutique Hotel & Spa, Mauritius. Experience carefree mornings and romantic evenings with daily buffet breakfast and nightly three-course dinner for two - skillfully prepared by expert chefs at onsite Ti Moris restaurant - included in your package. Relax completely in an adults-only environment with one complimentary cocktail per person included, to be enjoyed either at the bar or with your dinner.

title: Mauritius Five-Star Oceanfront Escape with Award-Winning Beach Bar
description:
Step into paradise with a stay at the five-star Sugar Beach Mauritius, perched along the sheltered bay of Flic en Flac on Mauritius’ sun-drenched west coast. Ranked in the top 10% of hotels worldwide on Tripadvisor, Sugar Beach Mauritius impresses with luxurious facilities and a picturesque location. A nod to a bygone era, the plantation-style architecture is balanced with a flurry of modern and fun additions - think selfie stations, a kid's club and music studio.

Enjoy a memorable meal and a perfectly mixed cocktail at the bohemian-chic Buddha-Bar Beach (winner at the International Hotel & Property Awards 2020), offering an unbeatable seaside location. If you’re hungry for more, there are four additional bars and restaurants onsite ready to tantalise your tastebuds. When you’re ready to relax, Cinq Mondes Spa is an escape from reality and offers a private steam room, heated and cold plunge pools, and a hammam complex. For a breath of fresh air, stretch out on Wolmar’s pristine beach, where the water is crystal clear and the sunsets are sublime

title: Mauritius Beachfront Escape Amid 14 Hectares of Coconut Groves & Gardens
description:
Immerse yourself in the beach-blessed beauty and sapphire waters of Mauritius with a boutique escape at La Pirogue Mauritius, perfectly poised along the breathtaking powder-white Flic en Flac Beach. Ranked among Tripadvisor’s top 10% of properties worldwide, this authentic Mauritian hideaway - with unique, air-conditioned thatch-roofed bungalows, mostly situated among the lush coconut groves that open privately onto the flamboyant sunset coast - offers the utmost in relaxation and privacy.

Perfect for families and couples who want to soak up the serenity, the property's exceptional facilities include six restaurants and three bars, plus a wide range of signature experiences including a golf course, music studio, an impressive dive centre and complimentary water and land sports. There's also a blissful spa, swimming pool and one of the best lengthy beaches of the Indian Ocean
